= Maven =

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.xmlmatchers</groupId>
  <artifactId>xml-matchers</artifactId>
  <version>0.10</version>
</dependency>
}}}


= Non-Maven =

Download the latest version from from the [http://code.google.com/p/xml-matchers/downloads/list download page].  

xml-matchers depends on [http://code.google.com/p/hamcrest/ Hamcrest] version 1.2 (hamcrest-core). If you are using the XML "equivalence" features, [http://xmlunit.sourceforge.net/ XML-Unit] version 1.3 is also required.
